title.en: Special Martial Arts Extreme Hell Private High School

description.en:
A teenager decides to enroll in a Martial Arts High school so he can learn how to defend himself and not get bullied anymore. But the school he has chosen to enroll in is not like all other typical martial arts schools and he will soon be caught up by a surprise!

[Wikipedia](https://ko.wikipedia.org/wiki/%EA%B2%A9%ED%88%AC%EA%B8%B0%ED%8A%B9%EC%84%B1%ED%99%94%EC%82%AC%EB%A6%BD%EA%B3%A0%EA%B5%90_%EA%B7%B9%EC%A7%80%EA%B3%A0)

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

title.en: I'm the Main Character of a Harem Manga, but I'm Gay so Every Day Is Hell for Me

altTitles.ja: Harem Manga no Shujinkou daga Douseiaisha nano de Mainichi ga Tsurai
Harem Manga no Shujinkou daga Gay nano de Mainichi ga Tsurai
ハーレム漫画の主人公だが同性愛者〈ゲイ〉なので毎日がつらい

description.en: Touge Yuugiri is the main character of a harem manga, but he's gay, so everyday is hell for him.

altTitles.en: Twin Star Exorcists: Adashino Benio's Arc

altTitles.pt-br: Exorcistas das estrelas gêmeas: Arco da Adashino Benio

description.en:
Spin-off of Sousei no Onmyouji.

Part of Volume 14 of Sousei no Onmyouji.
description.pt-br:
História paralela de Sousei no Onmyouji que conta a jornada da Benio para cumprir sua promessa que fez ao Rokuro. 

Obs.: Essa história paralela acontece após o capítulo 38 do mangá principal.

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

description.en:
a "heterogeneous" society where supernatural beings blend in. For these monsters, "cruel" is not enough to describe them. One such monster's unexpected appearance at funeral of Jeongyeon's mother forces her to enter their world. 

Don't you hate to see yourself being unfairly manipulated, don't you want revenge for all your suffering? 

Someone caught her just when she was about to collapse.

title.en: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.

altTitles.ja: 俺以外誰も採取できない素材なのに「素材採取率が低い」とパワハラする幼馴染錬金術師と絶縁した専属魔導士、辺境の町でスローライフを送りたい。

altTitles.en: The Assistant Mage Parts Ways With His Power Abusive Alchemist Childhood Friend and His Being Told to Have "Low Chance of Gathering Materials," and Wants to Start a Slow Life at a Town in the Remote Region
Only I Can Collect These Materials! ~ An Assistant Mage Who Broke up With His Alchemist Girlfriend After Her Harassment Wants to Lead a Slow Life in a Remote Town

altTitles.id: Padahal Hanya Aku yang Dapat Mengumpulkan Material Itu, tapi Aku Dikatai "Tingkat Pengumpulan Materialmu Ampas" sama Teman Semasa Kecilku yang Menjadi Alkemis, Aku pun Pensiun Menjadi Asisten Penyihirnya dan Memulai Hidup Baru yang Santai di Kota Terpencil.

description.en:
The Assistant Mage of the genius alchemist Ruby—Lloyd has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. 

Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. 

However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather.

The mage, who was treated as “incompetent” and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easy going life!
description.id: Asisten Penyihir, Lloyd, mempunyai kemampuan mengumpulkan material untuk alkemis yang rendah daripada orang lain yang membuat Alkemis yang menggangdengnya, Ruby, terus-terusan memarahi Lloyd yang dimatanya tidak pernah benar. Suatu hari dia muak dengan perlakuan Ruby yang makin menjadi-jadi dan memutuskan untuk pensiun menjadi asisten penyihirnya. Lantas, akan ke mana Lloyd pergi?
description.ja:
天才錬金術師ルビーの専属魔導士ロイドは、錬金術で使う素材の採取率が異常に低いため、ルビーのお荷物扱いとして国中の笑いものになっていた。
ルビーからも毎日怒られる日々を過ごしていた彼だが、あまりにも絶望的なこの環境が嫌になりついに彼女との絶縁を決意する！
しかし、みんなは知らなかった……。ロイドの揃える素材は、ほかの誰にも集められないような貴重なモノばかりだということに……。

自他ともに「無能扱い」されていた魔導士が目指す、理想のスローライフ！

title.en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: スケットダンス

description.en:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)

altTitles.ko: 이 결혼은 어차피 망하게 되어 있다

altTitles.en: This Marriage Is Bound to Fail Anyway
This Marriage Is Bound to Sink Anyway

altTitles.it: L'anello spezzato: questo matrimonio è destinato a finire

altTitles.pt: O anel quebrado: esse casamento irá falhar de qualquer forma

altTitles.pt-br: The Broken Ring: Um casamento fadado ao fracasso

altTitles.es: El anillo roto: Este matrimonio fracasará de todos modos
Pase lo que pase, este matrimonio se ira a pique

altTitles.uk: Зламана обручка: Цей шлюб все одно провалиться
Зламана обручка: Цей шлюб все одно провалиться

altTitles.th: ปลายทางวิวาห์นี้มีแต่ล่ม

altTitles.ja: この結婚はどうせうまくいかない

altTitles.zh: 反正这段婚姻注定失败

description.de:
Als die sechsjährige Inés zum ersten Mal den gut aussehenden Erben von Haus Escalante erblickt, macht sie den Jungen direkt zu ihrem Verlobten. Da alle adeligen Männer bekanntlich gleich sind, dachte sie, sie könnte auch gleich einen gut aussehenden wählen. Aber der kleine Lord Cárcel ist noch nicht bereit für diese Art von Verpflichtung und verbringt die nächsten 15 Jahre damit, die Heirat um jeden Preis zu vermeiden. Glücklicherweise ist das kein Problem für Inés, da das Scheitern ihrer Ehe genau das ist, was sie will. Tatsächlich gibt sie ihm sogar ihren Segen dafür, sich auszutoben, solange er sich nicht in ihre Angelegenheiten einmischt. Leider macht es nicht so viel Spaß, ein Playboy zu sein, wenn die Verlobte einem die Erlaubnis dazu gibt. Und bedeutet das nicht, dass sie ihn auch betrügt? Und so entschließt sich Cárcel, Inés’ Meinung über ihn zu ändern und zu beweisen, dass er der Ehemann sein kann, den sie immer wollte.

---
Note: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.

description.en:
When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.

---

description.fr:
Lorsque la jeune Inés pose ses yeux sur l'héritier de la famille Escalante du haut de ses six ans, elle n'hésite pas un instant avant de demander à ce qu'il soit son fiancé. Comme les hommes nobles sont tous les mêmes, autant en choisir un beau, pas vrai? Mais le seigneur Cárcel n'est pas du genre fidèle, et il aimerait bien esquiver ce mariage... seulement, lorsque quelques années plus tard, il apprend qu'Inés se fiche bien de son amour et de sa fidélité après leur union, et qu'elle n'est pas éprise de lui comme il le pensait, Cárcel réalise qu'il n'était pas si désintéressé qu'il ne l'aurait cru. Il décide donc de prouver à sa future femme qu'il peut être un époux digne d'elle... sans se douter une seconde de ce qui avait bien pu pousser Inés à le choisir ainsi lorsqu'ils étaient enfants...

---

description.id:
Dia bilang setelah kami menikah nanti, aku bahkan bisa lebih bebas daripada saat ini? Omong kosong macam apa itu? Dia bahkan memperbolehkanku untuk berkencan dengan wanita mana pun? Dia adalah seorang Duchess Escallante yang tidak tinggal bersama dengan Duke Escallante. Dia tidak butuh pria yang baik hati, melainkan pria yang suatu saat bisa disingkirkan dari kehidupannya secara hukum. Tapi sayang sekali, aku, Duke Escallante, tidak akan membiarkan hal itu terjadi. Aku tidak tertarik dengan kebebasan yang kau tawarkan. "Aku memang seorang bajing*n, tapi aku lebih setia daripada yang kamu bayangkan, Ines Valeztena."

description.it:
Inés non aveva bisogno di un marito normale, ma di un uomo che un giorno sarebbe stato legalmente rimosso dalla sua vita . Sfortunatamente , avere un playboy come fidanzato non è per niente una cosa bella. È così che Cárcel é stato etichettato. Ma ad un certo punto decide di cambiare e dimostrare che può essere il marito perfetto!

description.uk:
Шестирічна Інес звертає увагу на красеня-спадкоємця дому Ескаланте та оголошує його своїм нареченим. Оскільки усі знатні чоловіки для неї однакові, вона подумала, що могла хоча би вибрати гарненького. Але лорд Карсель ще не готовий до такого роду зобов’язань. Він проводить наступні півтора десятиліття, уникаючи шлюбу за будь-яку ціну!
На щастя, для Інес це не проблема, оскільки фіаско цього заміжжя — це саме те, чого вона хоче. Таким чином Карсель отримує благословення на походеньки, допоки він не втручається у її бізнес.
Та, на жаль, бути плейбоєм не так весело, коли ваша наречена дає вам дозвіл. І чи не означає це, що вона теж йому зраджує? Тепер Карсель налаштований змінити думку Інес про нього і довести, що він може бути чоловіком, якого вона завжди хотіла.

憨憨海王只想做禁欲姐姐的狗。 波澜不惊常年面瘫脸的伊娜丝小姐，执意要嫁给除了脸一无是处的海王卡西·凯特 是因为爱吗？ 本以为只是名存实亡的婚姻，没想到曾经的海王竟完全沦陷，疯狂贴贴！ 只是心态如古井般平静的她会被幼稚狗勾的猛烈攻势打动吗？

description.pt-br:
“Me casei com o maior gostosão da sociedade para então me divorciar e finalmente poder ser livre.”

Quando Inês de 6 anos colocou seus olhos no lindo herdeiro da Casa Escalante, ela logo o fez seu noivo. Já que homens nobres são todos iguais, ela imaginou que poderia pelo menos escolher um bonito. Mas lorde Cassel ainda não estava pronto para esse tipo de compromisso, e passou uma década e meia evitando o casamento de todo jeito! Felizmente, isso não era problema para a Inês, porque a falha neste casamento era exatamente o que ela queria. Na verdade, ele tinha a permissão dela para fazer o que quisesse, contanto que ficasse fora dos assuntos pessoais dela. Infelizmente, ser um playboy não é divertido quando se tem a permissão da esposa. E isso não significa que ela o está traindo também? Agora, Cassel está determinado a mudar a ideia que Inês tem na cabeça sobre ele e provar que ele pode ser o marido que ela sempre quis.

---

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: Granblue Fantasy: Bonds of the Twin Swords

altTitles.ja: グランブルーファンタジー　双剣の絆

description.en:
There was once a land by the name of Feendrache that was blessed by a primal beast. Upon the arrival of Gran and his companions Lyria and Vyrn, the kingdom becomes entwined in turmoil. With the aid of the Dragon Knights, they rush to save it from those who intend to plunge it into darkness.

An adaptation of the first two events/side stories in the "Dragon Knights" series from the mobile RPG *Granblue Fantasy*, Defender's Oath and Four Knights of a Fallen Land.

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuri to Koe to Kaze Matoi

altTitles.ja: 百合と声と風纏い

description.en:
A high school girl who has never known love meets an older woman with a secret...
A junior in high school, Matoi Noshita has never liked anyone and is fed up with being involved in her younger sister's and friends' boyfriend situations.
One day, she meets Yuriko, who has just moved from Tokyo. At a local driving school, she asks her to drive her home on her motorcycle.
Matoi is perplexed by her own curiosity about a woman whose name she does not know and where she lives.
"What on earth is this feeling I am having for the first time...?"
description.ja:
恋を知らない女子高生が出会ったのは、ある秘密を抱えた年上の女性――
高校 3 年生の埜下纏は、一度も人を好きになったことがなく、妹や友人の彼氏事情に巻き込まれることにうんざりしていた。
ある日纏は地元の教習所で東京から移り住んできたばかりの百合子に出会い、彼女の運転するバイクで家まで送ってもらうことになった。
名前も住んでいる場所も知らない彼女の事が気になってしまう自分に戸惑う纏。
初めて抱くこの気持ちは一体―…

description.en: A man who was reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

description.en: A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
description.vi: Một nhánh THE iDOLM@STER hoàn toàn mới - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. Truyện giới thiệu về các nhân vật và những điều liên quan đến Học viện tư lập Hatsuboshi.

title.en: YoRHa - Pearl Harbor Descent Record - A NieR:Automata Story

altTitles.ja-ro: NieR: Automata: YoRHa Shinjuwan Kouka Sakusen Kiroku

altTitles.ja: ヨルハ 真珠湾降下作戦記録

altTitles.en: YoRHa: Pearl Harbor Descent Mission Record

description.en:
***A complete comicalization of the musical drama that shares the same worldview as NieR:Automata!***

In the distant future, the earth is invaded by aliens and their "machine life" weapons, and humanity flees to the moon. The humans develop android soldiers and organize a resistance army. A long battle ensued & the year is 11941. In order to break the stalemate in the war, a new type of female android decisive weapon, "YoRHa," was formed and descended to the front lines of the Earth. What is the future of the automatic infantry dolls that fight only to carry out their goal of.... retaking the earth for humanity? A complete comicalization of the musical drama that shares the same worldview as NieR:Automata, written and supervised by Yoko Taro! (MTL)
description.pt: Adaptação da peça teatral "YoRHa Ver.1.2" de Yoko Taro, esta é a história de andróides lutando para recuperar a Terra para a humanidade, e o futuro para esses andróides cujo único propósito é lutar.

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party—

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, the main character, set out to defeat the demon king.
But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.
All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Ms Shizuko, the mother of the hero, sold as a slave—??

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

title.en: Sora no Kiseki Gaiden - Löwe Monogatari

altTitles.en: Sora no Kiseki Gaiden - Lowe Monogatari
Trails in the Sky: The Tale of Lowe
レーヴェ物語―空の軌跡外伝

description.en:
Manga about Leonhardt's life within the Sora no Kiseki story. It follows Leonhardt, a major antagonist for most of the series, from his humble origins in a small village to his climactic showdown with the main cast at the top of Axis Pillar in Sora no Kiseki Second Chapter.   
  
Contains spoilers for Sora no Kiseki.

altTitles.ja: まどろみバーメイド

description.en: A story about a female bartender and her special "my-pace" bar where she makes cocktails that leave an unforgettable taste in her customers' hearts.

Lin Feng travelled through worlds and even obtained an overpowered system, but he still faces a pressure as huge as a mountain.

System’s main quest:
Lin Feng is to create a school; establish history’s number 1 sect and Lin Feng himself to become the number 1 founder.

To become history’s number 1 founder, Lin Feng started to work hard.

“Your name is Shi Tianhao? Natural born sovereign roots but it was stolen by your cousin? Now being raised in a little village your father placed you in? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let those people know that justice that is owed must be returned!”

“Your name is Xiao Yan? A genius of the past but a loser now? Even your fiancé came over to humiliate you by asking for a divorce? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let that brat know the meaning of: don’t bully a youngster just because he’s poor!”

“Your name is Zhu Yi? The son of a marquis but you’re being suppressed by your father? Your mother was a saint but she was assassinated? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let your dad know the meaning how problems can be solved with your fists…no, with reasoning!”
description.zh: 简介穿越了，也有了一个系统，但林锋压力山大。系统主线任务：林锋开山立派，建立史上第一大宗门，林锋本人成为第一祖师。于是为了成为史上第一祖师爷，林锋开始奋斗。少年，跟为师一起开山立派吧！
description.pt-br: Lin Feng um viajante conseguiu um sistema que pode facilitar sua vida, mas ainda é muito difícil. Primeira missão do sistema, criar uma seita e conseguir discípulos e esta seita deve ser a melhor do mundo. Para ser o melho Lin Feng vai ter que trabalhar duro e ao mesmo tempo treinar seus novos discípulos.

altTitles.ja: 恋愛代行

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

altTitles.ja: ネトリヴェンジ

description.en: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the “Yokai” classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. The obscene revenge by “NTR” begins.
description.es-la: Soichi Sakuraba, un introvertido estudiante de instituto, sufre el acoso de los abusadores de su clase. El acoso se intensifica y Azusa, la única amiga de la infancia en la que Soichi confía, es profanada por ellos. En medio de la desesperación, Soichi se enfrenta a Asmon, un demonio lascivo. Soichi hace un contrato con un demonio lascivo con poderes misteriosos, y decide infligir el mismo sufrimiento a sus verdugos "cornudando" a sus seres queridos. Comienza la lasciva venganza de "NTR"...

altTitles.ja: シドニアの騎士

description.en:
Risking his life to ensure humanity's survival, Tanikaze Nagate rides out in his silver armour, the Tsugumori!  
  
Thousands of years have passed since the Gauna destroyed the Solar System.  
The enormous seed ship, Sidonia, travels through space while propagating and producing humans.  
Brought up in the lowest decks of Sidonia, a young man, Tanikaze Nagate, becomes a Guardian trainee, and is authorized to pilot the outdated but historically renowned Tsugumori.  
The battle with Nagate's life at stake begins now!  
  
Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category.

altTitles.ja: 思春期のアイアンメイデン

description.en:
Mayama Haruki and Himemiya Tsukiko have been childhood friends and neighbors for as long as they can remember, but after a girls-only meeting in fourth grade, Himemiya distanced herself from Mayama. Now in their 2nd year of middle school, Mayama has become an ero-freak who specializes in harassing Himemiya.  
  
Determined to unravel the greatest secret of girls, what happens on "that day", Mayama follows Himemiya and uncovers…!

"Excuse me, are you Korean?"

Due to a recent heartbreak, Hanjoon arrives at New York.

Not only is he delighted to meet a Korean in an unfamiliar city,
he has a one-night stand with him.

"I should've asked for his name."

However, these two end up meeting again in an unusual place.

Where will their one-night stand in the artist's city of New York lead them to?
description.pl:
"Przepraszam, jesteś Koreańczykiem?"

Z powodu niedawnego złamanego serca Hanjoon przybywa do Nowego Jorku.

Nie tylko jest zachwycony spotkaniem Koreańczyka w nieznanym mieście,
ma z nim jednonocną przygodę.

"Powinienem był zapytać o jego imię".

Jednak ta dwójka spotyka się ponownie w nietypowym miejscu.

Dokąd zaprowadzi ich jednonocna przygoda w mieście artysty, Nowym Jorku?

altTitles.ja: モノクロラバーズ

description.en:
One day, suddenly, an angel came descending from the sky!?  
While heading towards his university entrance ceremony, Yuu meets an unsociable, mysterious girl. Yuu, who can't help but be curious of her — who is as free-willing as a stray cat — gradually shortens the distance between them. As various feelings mix around, their bond gets spun together, but what can be seen beyond that is…

"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

Lee Saehyun fell into a deeply depressed state after losing his parents when he was still a child. Coincidentally, he meets a mysterious little boy named Yoonwo, who brings him peace of mind.

For years straight, the little boy would visit Saehyun's house once every week, which helped Saehyun pass time peacefully and comfortably.
However, suddenly after Saehyun began to meet other girls or go on dates, it would always rain, and there was no process in his romantic relationships.

But are these constant unfortunate and coincidental scenarios simply just coincidental? Or is this the work of someone up in the sky?

title.en: Hyouken no Majutsushi ga Sekai o Suberu

altTitles.ja: 冰剣の魔術師が世界を統べる
冰剣の魔術師が世界を統べる　世界最強の魔術師である少年は、魔術学院に入学する

Hyouken no Majutsu-shi ga Sekai o Suberu

The Iceblade Magician Rules Over the World
The Iceblade Sorcerer Shall Rule the World: A Boy, the Most Powerful Magician in the World, Enrolls in the Academy of Magic

altTitles.pt-br: O feiticeiro da lâmina de gelo deve governar o mundo
O feiticeiro da lâmina de gelo deve governar o mundo: Um menino, o mago mais poderoso do mundo, se matricula na Academia de Magia

altTitles.th: เรย์ไวท์ จอมเวทดาบเหมันต์ เด็กหนุ่มจอมเวทผู้แข็งแกร่งที่สุดในโลก ได้เข้ามาร่ำเรียนในโรงเรียนเวทมนตร์

description.en:
The Arnold Magic Academy, a prestigious school that has produced a lot of great wizards. One boy, Ray White, decided to attend as the only wizard from an ordinary family. He is surrounded by students from aristocratic families and magicians who distance themselves from him. But people don't know. He is a person who has made a lot of achievements in the previous Far East fight, and now he is said to be the strongest of the seven great wizards in the world. Despite being ignored as a magician, he will eventually show his power to those around him?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10029/episode/323438) (U.S. Only)
description.pt-br: A Arnold Magic Academy, uma escola de prestígio que produziu muitos magos excelentes. Um menino, Ray White, decidiu comparecer como o único bruxo de uma família comum. Ele está cercado por alunos de famílias aristocráticas e mágicos que se distanciam dele. Mas as pessoas não sabem. Ele é uma pessoa que fez muitas conquistas na luta anterior do Extremo Oriente, e agora ele é considerado o mais forte dos sete grandes magos do mundo. Apesar de ser ignorado como um mágico, ele acabará por mostrar seu poder para aqueles ao seu redor?

altTitles.ja: てのひら創世記

description.en:
My name is Suzaki Aiichirou, a lone wolf and I live to fight! However, one day an annoying girl came to my house and challenged me to a duel… and since that day on my life has completely changed. This is a story about the birth of a brand-new world.

---
**Notes:**
- The chapter number resets with each volume.
description.es-la:
Soy Suzaki Aiichirou, un lobo solitario. Mi vida es, todos los dias, peleas y riñas. Sin embargo, un día todo se acabó… "uwaaa~!!!" Un bebé misterioso apareció de repente en mi casa. Además, una molestosa espadachín se mudo a mi casa. Y así comienzan mis nuevos días. Un encuentro comenzó, uno que creará un nuevo mundo. Una pequeña historia, tuya y mia, sobre el nacimiento de un nuevo mundo.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/asaki_s)

altTitles.ja: 詩音 OF THE DEAD

altTitles.th: ชิออนแห่งความตาย

description.en: Shion Shoji, 15 years old (?), is a brilliant and gorgeous high school student!! Tsubasa Raimi, the lucky boy who sits beside her, is torn between whether or not to ask her out. Because, I mean…she’s totally a zombie!! Get ready for surreal gags and modern, refreshing, and slightly bittersweet school life, because even zombies need love!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yancha Gal no Anjou-santachi Kou ichi hen

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さんたち
やんちゃギャルの安城さんたち高1編

description.en: The misadventures of the mischievous gal Anjou-san and her friends. Non-canon.

altTitles.ja: 乙女怪獣キャラメリゼ

description.en: Afflicted by a "mysterious illness," high school first year Kuroe has spent her entire life avoiding socializing with others. However, after coming into contact with Minami Arata, the most popular boy in school, something changes— and Kuroe's true powers are unleashed…

altTitles.ja: 深海魚のアンコさん

description.en: Fish people have been welcomed to the town where the human girl Wakasa Otomi lives, and they are integrating well. The fish people can be identified by the physical marks of their fish species, though they take medicine to keep their lower bodies human rather than a fish tail. Otomi loves fish people, and is eager to meet as many as she can! One day, she meets a new transfer student, a lantern fish girl named Tsutsumi Anko. Anko is a bit self-conscious about being a deep sea fish, with a tail that is not cute like some other fish girls. At school, she and Anko deal with various fish problems that intersect with issues an ordinary human high-schooler would face.
description.ru: Вакаса Отоми живет в городе, жители которого добрососедствуют с русалками, а те, в свою очередь, принимают активное участие в жизни города, став частью его бытия. Отличительной чертой русалок от обычных горожан являются их физические особенности, которые различаются с учетом принадлежности к тому или иному виду. Например, им приходится поддерживать нижнюю часть тела в форме обычных ног при помощи медицинских препаратов, чтобы избежать их превращения обратно в хвост. Отоми же от русалок просто без ума и жаждет познакомиться со всеми, с кем сможет. И вот, в один прекрасный день, в класс Отоми переводится новая ученица Цуцуми Анко, русалка-удильщик с фонариком на голове. Анко стесняется того, что она глубоководная рыба, поскольку её хвостик не такой милый, как у остальных.

altTitles.ja: 四稲家の人々

description.en: One day a high school student named Haruhiko who is aiming for Tokyo University has discovered a very important secret. From the closet, appeared a beautiful girl with a black pony tail, Utsuki who came from "Moon Village" with her Ninja Troop said to him, "It's been 7 years, master."

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

title.en: Human-Hating Teacher in a Non-Human Classroom ~Hitoma-sensei, Can You Teach Us About Humans....?~

altTitles.ja: 人外教室の人間嫌い教師 ヒトマ先生、私たちに人間を教えてくれますか……？

altTitles.ja-ro: Jingai Kyoushitsu no Ningen Kirai Kyoushi ~Hitoma-sensei, Watashi-tachi ni Ningen wo Oshiete kuremasu ka....?~

altTitles.en: A Misanthrope Teaches a Class for Demi-Humans

altTitles.es-la: Un profesor que odia a los humanos en un aula no humana ~Hitoma-sensei, ¿Puede enseñarnos sobre los humanos....?

description.en:
These girls aren't human. Still, they adore humans more than anyone. 

I am Hitoma Rei, a NEET nearing 30 years old who was traumatized by  human relationships.  When I changed jobs, I ended up at an all-girls school whose purpose is to take non-humans and make them human!? Spending my days with the strange students Minadzuki Kyouka, a mermaid; Oogami Isaki, a werewolf; Usami Sui, a rabbit; and Haneda Tobari, a bird... 

Why do they want to be human? What do they want to do once they become human? I will teach them about humans. This may be an alternate world, but it's not like I've been reincarnated. This is just the story of a teacher who spends time with some girls who wish to become human, in a slightly odd school.
description.es-la: Estas chicas no son humanas. Sin embargo, adoran a los humanos más que a nadie. Hitoma Rei un NEET de casi 30 años que odia a los humanos por traumas del pasado. En su nuevo trabajo, como profesor en una escuela sólo para chicas cuyo propósito es tomar a los no humanos y convertirlos en humanos... Pasando sus días con las peculiares estudiantes, una sirena; una loba; un conejo y un pájaro... ¿Por qué quieren ser humanos? ¿Qué quieren hacer una vez que se conviertan en humanos? Les enseñaré sobre los humanos. Puede que este sea un mundo alternativo, pero no es que me haya reencarnado. Esta es sólo la historia de un profesor que pasa el tiempo con algunas chicas que desean convertirse en humanas, en una escuela un poco extraña.

title.en: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso - Coda

altTitles.ja: 四月は君の嘘 Coda

description.en: A short story collection from Kousei and Tsubaki's childhood.

altTitles.th: เพลงรักสองหัวใจ

altTitles.ja: 四月は君の嘘

description.en:
Piano prodigy Arima Kosei dominated the competition and all child musicians knew his name. But after his mother, who was also his instructor, passed away, he had a mental breakdown while performing at a recital that resulted in him no longer being able to hear the sound of his piano even though his hearing was perfectly fine. Even two years later, Kosei hasn’t touched the piano and views the world in monotone, and without any flair or color. He was content at living out his life with his good friends Tsubaki and Watari until, one day, a girl changed everything. Miyazono Kaori is a pretty, free spirited violinist whose playing style reflects her personality. Kaori helps Kosei return to the music world and show that it should be free and mold breaking unlike the structured and rigid style Kosei was used to.  
  
Nominated for the 2012 Manga Taisho Award.  
Winner of the Kodansha Manga Award (2013).

Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.

altTitles.ja: 黒猫と魔女の教室

altTitles.en: The Classroom of a Black Cat and a Witch

altTitles.vi: Hắc miêu và lớp học phù thủy

altTitles.en: The Black Cat and the Witch's Classroom

altTitles.id: Ruang Kelas Kucing Hitam dan Penyihir

altTitles.vi: Lớp học của mèo đen và nàng phù thuỷ

description.en: Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch, but she can't use magic. She needs a tutor to get into the magic academy she's always dreamed of, but she doesn't have the money or the connections... But suddenly, Spica meets a mysterious, talking black cat who can use magic! He agrees to make her his apprentice, but only if she promises to rid him of his curse! But to break it, she has to kiss him on the...!?
description.ja: 『寄宿学校のジュリエット』金田陽介、最新作！「魔女見習い」スピカ・ヴァルゴは魔法が使えない。憧れの魔法学校合格のためには師匠が必要だが、金もコネもない。そんな時、人語を駆使し魔法を使う謎の黒猫がスピカの前に現れた!! 魔術を学びたいスピカと呪いを解きたい黒猫の思惑は完全一致。秘密の師弟関係が結ばれた！呪いを解く鍵は「×××」にキス!?ポンコツ魔女×黒猫先生の魔法学園ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.vi: Tác phẩm mới nhất của Kaneda Yousuke, tác giả bộ truyện “Juliet của trường nội trú”! “Phù thuỷ tập sự” Spica Virgo không thể sử dụng phép thuật. Để có thể đỗ vào ngôi trường ma pháp mà mình hằng ngưỡng mộ, Spica cần phải có một vị sư phụ dạy bảo, nhưng cô không có tiền, cũng chẳng có quan hệ. Chính vào lúc đó, một con mèo bí ẩn biết nói tiếng người và sử dụng ma pháp đột nhiên xuất hiện trước mắt cô! Spica – cô bé muốn học ma thuật và chú mèo đen muốn hoá giải lời nguyền bị ếm lên mình, cùng với ý tưởng lớn gặp nhau, giữa hai người đã hình thành mối quan hệ thầy – trò bí mật! Chìa khoá để hoá giải lời nguyền chính là một nụ hôn lên ×××!? Câu chuyện kỳ ảo về học viện ma pháp của cô phù thuỷ hậu đậu và người thầy mèo đen, chính thức bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Do mesmo autor de "Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet", Kaneda Yousuke, nova serialização! [Uma bruxa novata] Spica Virgo não consegue usar magia. Para poder entrar na academia de bruxos de seus sonhos ela precisa de um mestre de magia, mas ela não tem dinheiro nem conexões. Nessa hora, um misterioso gato preto que pode falar a lingua humana e usar magia aparece na sua frente!! Os objetivos da Spica que quer aprender magia e o gato preto que quer quebrar a maldição se coincidem. Uma relação secreta entre professor e aprendiz foi estabelecida! A chave para quebrar a maldição é beijar o [xxx]!? A história de fantasia da bruxa desajeitada x O professor gato preto na academia de magia, inicia-se!

altTitles.ja: 忘れえぬ魔女の物語

description.en:
Even if today disappears, these feelings will not.
An everyday in which nothing happens, with each day slightly different than the last.
The slightly strange story of her, and me, and our clumsy feelings.

Only I remember that there were three entrance ceremonies this year. Only I remember the unchosen days. The world, repeating 'todays' like a broken record...

"My name is Inaba Michiru. Nice to meet you."

A story about her, who befriended me the following day as well. About my first human relationship, about the gradually shrinking distance between us, and my quietly changing feelings...

A slightly strange story about a friendless, loveless me, and her, and our clumsy feelings.

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

altTitles.ja: さわらないで小手指くん

description.en:
Kotesashi Kouyou is an outstanding masseur, and aspiring sports doctor. Aiming to obtain a scholarship for medical school, he begins attending Seiwa High School, a sports powerhouse, this spring. As his family is poor he has to work as the hostels' manager, where he is also allowed to stay, to pay for his school expenses. Here he meets high school girl athletes, each with their own individual quirks. As the hostels' new manager, Kotesashi must now take care of their physical and mental needs!

Sports club high school girls and massages! The massage love comedy begins!
description.ja: 卓越したマッサージ技術を持つ主人公・小手指向陽。スポーツドクターを志す小手指は、医学部特待をGETすべく、この春からスポーツ強豪校・星和大付属高校に通うことに。実家が貧乏な小手指は学費を稼ぐため寮に住み込みで働くことになっていたのだが、そこで出会ったのは一癖も二癖もあるJKアスリート達だった。小手指の仕事は、管理人業務と彼女達の心身のケア。部活JK×マッサージ！Hで過激な寮生活が幕を開けた！
description.ru: Котесаши Коё - главный герой, обладающий выдающимися навыками массажиста. Он стремится стать спортивным врачом и хочет получить медицинское образование. Поэтому начиная с весны, он будет посещать спортивную среднюю школу при Университете Сэйва, чтобы достичь своей мечты. Родители Котесаши небогаты, и ему приходится жить и работать в общежитии, чтобы заработать себе на обучение. Однако там он сталкивается с девушками-спортсменками с различными проблемами, и теперь Котесаши придётся работать не только в общежитии, но и заботиться о спортсменках, поддерживая их здоровье физически, а также оказывая моральную поддержку. Всё это положило начало его бурной жизни в общежитии!
description.es-la: Kotesashi Kouyou es el protagonista que posee una sobresaliente habilidad como masajista. Aspira a ser médico deportivo, quiere obtener un trato especial en la facultad de medicina, a partir de primavera, asistirá a la preparatoria adjunta a la universidad Seiwa, una escuela potencia en los deportes. Como su familia no es adinerada, tiene que trabajar como encargado de unos dormitorios donde le permiten hospedarse, para poder pagar sus gastos escolares, sin embargo, en ese lugar se encuentra con chicas atletas preparatorianas con varios problemas. El trabajo de Kotesashi es cuidar física y mentalmente de ellas, así como ser el encargado de los dormitorios. ¡Preparatorianas de clubes deportivos y masajes! ¡Todo esto dará comienzo a una vida llena de intensa excitación en los dormitorios!

altTitles.ja: 戦闘員、派遣します！

description.en: The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!
description.es: La Sociedad Secreta Kisaragi tiene una misión: dominación mundial. Afirman que es una organización malvada, pero su científica es excéntrica, sus ardientes generales mujeres usan poca ropa y están sorprendentemente preocupados por el destino del mundo. No. 6 es un Combatiente para Kisaragi, lo que significa que su cuerpo ha sido reconstruido para ser más fuerte y obedecer las órdenes de los generales. ¿Su última misión? Hacer reconocimiento en un planeta alienígena desconocido con su nueva pareja, la inexpresiva androide Alicia. Allí, conocí a una caballero tetona…¡¿montando un unicornio?! ¡Así comienza su hilarante invasión de un mundo mágico de fantasía!
description.pt: Havia uma empresa chamada Kisaragi, uma sociedade secreta do mal que derruba um número de heróis no mundo e está prestes a conquistar o muno. Como não se sabe os desejos dessa associação, o combatente N° 6, o protagonista, será despachado para outros planetas com a android Alice. No entanto, este combatente mudou as configurações da android pare que ela não se comportasse como se fosse uma invasão, e sim u festival de Ochin, fazendo seus companheiros ficarem estúpidos. Além disso, quando chamaram novos companheiros, os novos membros que se uniram atraíram estandarismo, como a estupida quimera e o bispo. Enquanto isso, o mesmo vendedor que invoca o exército Magus começa a invadir a terra para destruí-la. A notícia se espalha nas ruas por atos de contravenção, e é transmitida ao herói que estava carregando a virtude do mal. “Não há organizações más no mundo” combatente N° 6 finalmente entra em ação com as heroínas metamorfose e as táticas de Kudzu, invadindo o novo mundo.
description.ru: Протагонистом является старший элитный боец корпорации зла именуемой как "Тайное сообщество Кисараги", которого вместе с девочкой андроидом отправили в другое измерение. И так они оказываются в мире меча и магии, где им предстоит создать предпосылки для захвата этого нового мира корпорацией зла Кисараги.

description.en: During summer break, a junior high school student Mitsuharu collides with an unusual creature while speeding on his bicycle. That unusual creature was a genderless alien called Toki who came to Earth for a "purpose". An unpredictable story about a lonely human and an alien starts!

altTitles.ja: 世界鬼

description.en:
A manga on Urasunday Magazine, Sekai Oni follows the story of a little girl called Shinonome Azuma.   
  
With her parents dead or missing, Azuma has been taken into her uncle's family. However her new family has been harshly abusing her, to the point she has become so mentally unstable she developed the rare syndrome of Alice Through the Looking Glass, which makes her see things that shouldn't be there reflected on mirrors, water, glass, etc.   
  
Everything begins when the things she sees start affecting the real world directly, and the barrier between reality and illusion breaks apart.  
  
Welcome to the world at the other side of the mirror. Welcome to wonderland.
description.pt-br:
Sekai Oni segue a história de uma garotinha chamada Shinonome Azuma.

Com seus pais mortos ou desaparecidos, Azuma foi colocada na família de seu tio. No entanto sua nova família está duramente abusando dela, ao ponto que ela se tornou tão mentalmente instável que ela desenvolveu a síndrome rara de Alice in Mirrorland, o que faz com que ela veja coisas que não deveria estar lá refletidas em espelhos, água, vidro, etc.

Tudo começa quando as coisas que ela vê começam a afetar o mundo real diretamente, e a barreira entre realidade e ilusão se rompe.

Bem-vindo ao mundo do outro lado do espelho. Bem vindo ao País das Maravilhas.
